description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $147.0M
  in 2020-2021 on contracts with SPARTAN BIOSCIENCE. The average
  contract duration was 1.01 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $149.0M.
  The longest contract was 1.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $149.0M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '147.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2020-2021'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '1'

s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '90%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '70.8M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.01'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '149.0M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '1.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '149.0M'
